text: The Cal State San Marcos station is a Sprinter light rail line that is served by North County Transit District. It is next to California State University San Marcos. == Platforms and tracks == Westbound station Station Station Station Eastbound station San Marcos Civic Center (toward Oceanside Transit Center) Cal State San Marcos Nordahl Road (toward Escondido Transit Center) ← → == Other websites == Map of the station on Google Maps Category:North County Transit District stations Category:2008 establishments in California
title: Cal State San Marcos (NCTD station)
